name: Halfway Down
description:
A Cruel Foddian Platformer.

Inspired by games such as Jump King and Getting Over It, this game forces you to complete highly precise gameplay under pressure of losing progress. There are no permanent checkpoints so be prepared to replay a lot of sections.

This game is ridiculously difficult and extremely frustrating.

While it is possible, do not actually try to beat this nightmare. For the few that actually play my game, good luck.

To anyone that actually completes this game...

Your name's will appear at the bottom ranked by time to complete. However, it could take 40+ hours of practice to even have a shot at the final jump.
